MemoryInfobox.description: 'A Followers of Ares|Follower of Ares drew up plans to attack a bandit camp where valuables were kept. Kassandra found the letter with the plans and devised her own strategy.'

General_Description: '''Stealing From the Poor''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On the corpse of a [[Followers of Ares|Follower of Ares]], Kassandra discovered a note detailing the location of valuables.
Section_Messages: *''Why should [[Thief|thieves]] have [[drachma]]e while the Followers have nothing? There's a chest of riches in a bandit camp - ripe for theft.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the location and claimed the valuables for herself.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
